name: Capsize
oracle_text:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

name: Cloudchaser Eagle
oracle_text:
Flying
When Cloudchaser Eagle enters the battlefield, destroy target enchantment.
flavor_text:
When the eagle catches a cloud, it tears it into strips that fall to earth.
—Vec myth of the rains

name: Counterspell
oracle_text: Counter target spell.
flavor_text:
"It was probably a lousy spell in the first place."
—Ertai, wizard adept

name: Disenchant
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: The swarm seemed unmoved by the artificial slivers' destruction. "They clearly were not the leaders," Hanna cursed. "I guess we'll have to do this the hard way."

name: Emerald Charm
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Untap target permanent.
• Destroy target non-Aura enchantment.
• Target creature loses flying until end of turn.

name: Empyrial Armor
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each card in your hand.
flavor_text:
"An angel appeared in the smoldering skies above the fray, her clothes as flames, her armor as fire."
—"Hymn of Angelfire"

name: Fireblast
oracle_text:
You may sacrifice two Mountains rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Fireblast deals 4 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Embermages aren't well known for their diplomatic skills.

name: Force Spike
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

name: Goblin Vandal
oracle_text: Whenever Goblin Vandal attacks and isn't blocked, you may pay {R}. If you do, destroy target artifact defending player controls and Goblin Vandal assigns no combat damage this turn.

name: Hydroblast
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Counter target spell if it's red.
• Destroy target permanent if it's red.
flavor_text:
"Heed the lessons of our time: the forms of water may move the land itself and hold captive the fires within."
—Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran Royal Mage

name: Impulse
oracle_text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
flavor_text:
"Controlling time ensures you need never look impulsive again."
—Teferi

name: Incinerate
oracle_text: Incinerate deals 3 damage to any target. A creature dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.
flavor_text:
"Never taunt an embermage, 'What are you going to do about it?'"
—Akin, seasoned askari

name: Ironclaw Orcs
oracle_text: Ironclaw Orcs can't block creatures with power 2 or greater.
flavor_text: Generations of genetic weeding have given rise to the deviously cowardly Ironclaw clan.

name: Mana Leak
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
flavor_text:
"The fatal flaw in every plan is the assumption that you know more than your enemy."
—Volrath

name: Man-o'-War
oracle_text: When Man-o'-War enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"Beauty to the eye does not always translate to the touch."
—Naimah, Femeref philosopher

name: Memory Lapse
oracle_text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Um . . . oh . . . what was I saying?"
—Reveka, Wizard Savant

name: Mogg Fanatic
oracle_text: Sacrifice Mogg Fanatic: It deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: "I got it! I got it! I—"

name: Mogg Flunkies
oracle_text: Mogg Flunkies can't attack or block alone.
flavor_text: They'll attack whatever's in front of them—as long as you tell them where that is.

name: Nomads en-Kor
oracle_text: {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Nomads en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead.
flavor_text: The Kor forsake roots for the winding of the path; forsake voices for the silence of the mind; forsake all else for the poverty of isolation.

name: Pyroblast
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Counter target spell if it's blue.
• Destroy target permanent if it's blue.
flavor_text:
"Just the thing for those pesky water mages."
—Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

name: Shattering Pulse
oracle_text:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Destroy target artifact.

name: Shock
oracle_text: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
Lightning tethers souls to the world.
—Kor saying

name: Soltari Visionary
oracle_text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Whenever Soltari Visionary deals damage to a player, destroy target enchantment that player controls.

name: Soul Warden
oracle_text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text:
Count carefully the souls and see that none are lost.
—Vec teaching

name: Thrull Surgeon
oracle_text: {1}{B}, Sacrifice Thrull Surgeon: Look at target player's hand and choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text: "Just take a little off the top."

name: Wall of Roots
oracle_text:
Defender
Put a -0/-1 counter on Wall of Roots: Add {G}. Activate only once each turn.
flavor_text: Sometimes the wise ones wove their magic into living plants; as the plant grew, so grew the magic.
